import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { blogDataFetch } from './Components/Functions/microCmsFetch' import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles' import Box from '@mui/material/Box' import Paper from '@mui/material/Paper' import { CssBaseline } from '@mui/material' import { ThemeProvider } from '@emotion/react' import { createTheme } from '@mui/material/styles' function App() { const [blogs, setBlogs] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { blogDataFetch(setBlogs) },[]) const theme = createTheme(); const StyledBox = styled(Box)({ backgroundColor: 'white', boxShadow: '0px 1px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)', padding: '20px', }); return (
{blogs.map(blog => ( <>

{blog.title}

{blog.title}

))}
); } export default App;
